mapper.select: select a.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select a.* from employee a order by emp_id) a) a where rn between #{pagesize}*(#{page} - 1) + 1 and #{pagesize}*#{page}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (emp_id, pass, emp_nm, rank, email, tel, join_dt, depart_id, posi_id, emp_pic, sign, able, email_pass) values(#{emp_id}, #{pass}, #{emp_nm}, #{rank}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{join_dt}, #{depart_id}, #{posi_id}, #{emp_pic}, #{sign}, #{able}, #{email_pass})
mapper.update: update employee set emp_id = #{emp_id}, pass = #{pass}, rank = #{rank}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, join_dt = #{join_dt}, emp_pic = #{emp_pic}, sign = #{sign}, able = #{able}, email_pass = #{email_pass} where emp_id = #{emp_id}
